results.title: La Gioconda
results.creator_credit: Hugo Kach, Filippo Sanjust and Osterreichischer Rundfunk-Fernsehen
results.brief_description: Set in the 17th Century, a ballad singer attempts to save her mother and win the love of her Genoese Prince by becoming involved in the elopement of two lovers. Performers include: Eva Marton, Placido Domingo, Matteo Manuguerra, Ludmila Semtschuk, Kurt Rydl. Vienna State Opera (Vienna) conducted by Adam Fischer. Text by Arrigo Boito after Victor Hugo. Music by Amilcare Ponchielli.

results.title: Anne of Green Gables (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Kevin Sullivan, Ian McDougall and Sullivan Films
results.brief_description: Artistically filmed amidst the spectacular scenery of Prince Edward Island, Canada, this award winning movie follows the provocative life drama of Anne Shirley, an endearing orphan, from her struggles as an adolescent to her triumphs as a young woman. Based on the novel “Anne of Green Gables” by Lucy Maud Montgomery, it stars Megan Follows and Colleen Dewhurst.

results.title: The Seven year itch
results.creator_credit: Billy Wilder, Charles K. Feldman and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: A husband of seven years, alone in New York while his family is on vacation, fantasises an affair with the TV model in the upstairs apartment and develops “The seven year itch”. Tortured by guilt, he envisions so many dire consequences that he finally runs off to join his wife. Tom Ewell and Marilyn Monroe star in this tremendous comedy. Based on the play by George Axelrod.

results.title: The Picture of Dorian Gray
results.creator_credit: Albert Lewin, Pandro S. Berman and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: The picture of Dorian Gray is a superb film based on Oscar Wilde’s novel about a young man who wishes that his portrait could age while he remains youthful. The portrait does grow old, showing not only Dorian Gray’s age but also the sins and aberrations of his wicked life. Dorian remains handsome, young and seemingly uncorrupted by his own decadence. Stars George Sanders, Hurd Hatfield, Donna Reed, Angela Lansbury and Peter Lawford.

results.title: The Woman in Question = Five Angles on Murder
results.creator_credit: Anthony Asquith, Teddy Baird and Javelin Films
results.brief_description: After a fortune teller is found murdered, five people relate totally different impressions of the murdered woman to the police. These impressions help the police to discover the killer’s identity. Starring Dirk Bogarde.

results.title: Meet me in St. Louis
results.creator_credit: Vincente Minnelli, Arthur Freed, United Artists Corporation and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description: A captivating musical set in St. Louis at the time of the 1903 World’s Fair. The story tells of a family who are crushed to learn that their father has accepted a transfer to New York City. The five children don’t want to leave their friends, or, most of all, miss the fair. The family upheaval and the final resolution of the story, make an unforgettable, heart-warming movie. Based on the novel by Sally Benson and starring Judy Garland and Margaret O’Brien.

results.title: Guess who's coming to dinner?
results.brief_description: Katharine Hepburn and Spencer Tracy portray the proud parents of a young lady who’s about to bring home the man she wants to marry. They’ve heard he’s handsome and full of career prospects but when they discover that he’s black they find out that they’re not as broadminded as they thought. Sidney Poitier is the son-in-law elect in this examination of prejudice and social manners.

results.title: Carousel
results.creator_credit: Henry King, Henry Ephron and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: Gordon MacRae and Shirley Jones star in this musical fantasy about the miraculous powers of love. Filmed on location with beautiful seaside settings as a backdrop and a thrilling score for accompaniment, their romance unfolds. Gordon MacRae is Billy, a carnival worker who falls in love with Shirley Jones. Before the birth of their daughter, Billy is killed. Now years later, he returns to earth for one day to teach his daughter one very important lesson. A poetic and lyrical Rodgers and Hammerstein musical based on Ferenc Molnar’s play “Liliom”.

results.title: The Grass is singing
results.creator_credit: Michael Raeburn, Mark Forstater, Svenska filminstitutet and Chibote Ltd
results.brief_description: Set against the overwhelming African bush, Karen Black as Mary Turner plays a desperate woman searching for security and love. Unable to come to terms with herself or the land she lives in, Mary accepts a marriage proposal from farmer John Thaw, rather than remain single in a big city. But this is not the escape she hoped it to be. Based on the novel by Doris Lessing.

results.title: My Life as a Dog = Mit Liv Som Hund
results.creator_credit: Lasse Hallstrom, Waldemar Bergendahl, FilmTeknik and Svensk Filmindustri
results.brief_description: A film about growing up in Sweden in 1959 as seen through the eyes of Ingemar. Ingemar has to confront death, sex, soccer, girls, abandonment and guilt. Based on the autobiographical novel by Reider Jonsson.
